short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take unlimited screenshots of any webpage. Annotate, edit, and save screenshots locally, or upload and share them via Google Drive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily screenshot page in one of several ways:
‚úÖ Screenshot whatever is currently visible on page,
‚úÖ Screenshot entire page,
‚úÖ Mark an area on and screenshot only that.

üì∏ Once a screenshot is taken, it will be saved on your computer. 
You will be able to annotate it by drawing lines or arrows, rectangles, highlighting, cropping, blurring and so on.

üöÄ Connect with Google Drive & share links!
Screenshot Collab has the ability to connect with your Google Drive account and let you easily upload and share links to your screenshots. 

üî• FREE & Without Limitations!
There are no limits, other than the free space on your üíª or on Google Drive if you use it!

‚å®Ô∏è Keyboard Shortcuts, for easier workflow
Make screenshot by simply pressing ALT+2, or whatever combination you set. No need to navigate popups or weird UIs!

üõí Browse history, edit, share, delete old screenshots
You can see all of your screenshots in sidepanel! 
Search them by page title or url, order by date taken, grab links on Google Drive and more.



-- --
Changelog:
*version 0.1.9, 0.2.0:
- Make sidepanel responsive
- Fix sidepanel item deletion & pagination
- Cosmetic changes
- Add link to change keyboard shortcuts to options page

*version 0.1.8:
- Disable Google Drive on non Chrome browsers

*version 0.1.7:
- Integration with Google Drive updated

*version 0.1.6:
- Optimized screenshot procedures
- Can make screenshot when browser page is zoomed-in

*version 0.1.5:
- added key bindings to make screenshots without opening the "popup" in toolbar

*version 0.1.4:
- Integration with Google Drive, upload & share screenshots!
- Multi-language support


On the roadmap:
- Integrate with services such as Dropbox (for remote storage)
- Implement teams functionalities (categorizing, commenting, sharing)
- Add desktop screenshot option
- Adding more tools to the image editor, optimizing current ones
- A lot more...
